chat.msg1: Can you describe how you optimized page performance in your last project?

chat.msg3: Great! Can you elaborate on how you implemented code splitting?

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Check out our pricing plans and choose the one that fits you best

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Can't find the answer? We can help

q1.question: What's included in the free trial?
q1.answer: Free plan includes 3 mock interviews per day, basic resume templates, and basic question practice to fully experience our services.

q2.question: How does the AI interviewer work?
q2.answer: Our AI interviewer is based on large language models, capable of generating professional questions based on position requirements and analyzing your answers in real-time.

q3.question: What resume formats are supported?
q3.answer: We support PDF, Word, online preview and other formats. Pro users can access more advanced templates.

q4.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
q4.answer: You can cancel anytime in account settings. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
